list.name: Changes
list.comment: Finished Code - Variables were used to store the songs data, popularity checker, and the function used to put the message together. A method was created to put the data together into a concise single string.

task.summary: End of "Mobile Notifications" practice. Created an "if/else if" statement to complete the code.

Finished the "Movie-ticket price" had to "cheat" here due to getting stuck between the if expression and when expression. In the end it uses a when expression to return the appropriate price with a nested if/else expression to determine the day for the discount.

Cheated for the first line "printFinalTemperature(27.0, "Celsius", "Fahrenheit") { 9.0 / 5.0 * it + 32}" as I didn't understand we needed the formulas or what the actual task was. 1/10 for this as practice due to non-extensive math being taught in the language yet and using the lambda expression at the end for the formula is smart, but I would not have even began to think of it. Do better Google

Finished Code - Variables were used to store the songs data, popularity checker, and the function used to put the message together. A method was created to put the data together into a concise single string.
